Ustawienie Å›cieÅ¼ki przejazdu w takiej przestrzeni jest moÅ¼liwe. Podobnie obrzeÅ¼a wymagajÄ… dokoszenia rÄ™cznego (noÅ¼e w odlegÅ‚oÅ›ci ok. 10 cm od krawÄ™dzi robota). Natomiast wygoda zwiÄ…zana z brakiem koniecznoÅ›ci montaÅ¼u przewodu ograniczajÄ…cego jest nie do przecenienia. I do tego trawa jest koszona przejazdami rÃ³wnolegÅ‚ymi, powstajÄ… paski.
content.en: High-quality product, looks refined. The LiDAR-based location system works well, although it must be remembered that the works should not enter spaces narrower than 1 m, for example between plants. It is possible to set a path in such a space. Similarly, edges require manual mowing (knives approximately 10 cm from the edge of the robot). However, the convenience of not having to install the boundary wire cannot be overestimated. Additionally, the grass is mown in parallel passes, creating strips.

content.pl: Po prawie dwÃ³ch tygodniach uÅ¼ytkowania jestem pewien, Å¼e A1 speÅ‚nia moje oczekiwania - banalnie prosty w instalacji i uÅ¼ytkowaniu (kilkakrotnie modyfikowaÅ‚em/ulepszaÅ‚em mapÄ™ Å¼eby zminimalizowaÄ‡ skrawki do wykoÅ„czenia wykaszarkÄ…), Å›wietnie radzi sobie z trawnikiem i wszelkiego typu przeszkodami (rabaty, drzewa, zwierzÄ™ta), cichy, w praktyce niezauwaÅ¼alny dla domownikÃ³w i sÄ…siadÃ³w (ryczÄ…cy silnik kosiarki spalinowej to przeszÅ‚oÅ›Ä‡, moÅ¼na kosiÄ‡ w nocy), trawnik piÄ™knieje w oczach i nie ma potrzeby usuwania Å›ciÄ™tej trawy (Å›cinki sÄ… niezauwaÅ¼alne i pozostajÄ… jako naturalny nawÃ³z). Dwie strefy trawnika w moim przypadku sÄ… wystarczajÄ…ce. AI i komunikacja przez WiFi mesh i blutooth bez zarzutu na powierzchni blisko 1 tys m2.
content.en: After almost two weeks of use, I am sure that A1 meets my expectations - it is very easy to install and use (I modified/improved the map several times to minimize the scraps to be finished with a brushcutter), it copes perfectly with the lawn and all types of obstacles (flower beds, trees, animals). , quiet, practically unnoticeable to household members and neighbors (the roaring engine of a petrol lawnmower is a thing of the past, you can mow at night), the lawn becomes more beautiful and there is no need to remove the cut grass (the clippings are unnoticeable and remain as a natural fertilizer). Two lawn zones are sufficient in my case. AI and communication via WiFi mesh and Bluetooth are flawless on an area of â€‹â€‹nearly 1,000 m2.

content.en:
It works ok for now, there are only 2 zones, not enough for my complicated garden. The application mentions that more zones will be added in the next application, but there was already one and there are still two. The application is in Polish, but the works do not speak Polish. This is probably not a problem if the Polish language option is available in a regular vacuum cleaner.
To sum up: if we focus on mapping and add areas that it should not enter, it works great. I am looking forward to adding at least 2 additional working areas of the robot so that I can use it more optimally. If they are not added in the next updates, I will be disappointed. But I would rather be pleasantly disappointed because the equipment is worth attention. Regards, AndrzejğŸ¤š

content.en: The equipment looks great - if someone pays attention to its appearance, they will be very pleased. Starting the equipment and using the application is very intuitive, everything is done step by step and you can start mowing very quickly.

content.en: The application is full of errors, it mows incorrectly and takes a very long time, the rain protection system does not work because the mower stops in one place. It can enter a forbidden zone and get stuck, generally I have to manually move it to the base every 2 days because it has stopped and unloaded. Its only advantage - its appearance - is actually a disadvantage because after a week it would have to be washed... eh, a terrible purchase on my part. Aaaand he can mow 2000 m2, but probably for a week

content.en: A few words about the device I bought a month ago and ... it doesn't work well if you have any trees or slopes, so what if it can overcome slopes up to 40 degrees if it treats them as obstacles and avoids the area by showing the obstacle on the map, the second thing is that if if you have a narrow lawn less than 2 m long, the robot gets lost. Knowing this, I wouldn't make this purchase again. The device is easy to use and intuitive.
